source: Tennessee Department of Veterans Services and 211 Tennessee

resources.name: Tennessee Department of Veterans Services
resources.description: State agency providing veterans with benefits counseling, claims assistance, and referral services for housing, employment, education, and health services.

resources.name: 2-1-1 Tennessee
resources.description: Free helpline connecting veterans to community resources including housing, employment, food assistance, legal aid, mental health services, and benefits programs.

resources.name: Memphis Veterans Village
resources.description: Transitional housing community for homeless veterans providing supportive services, job training, and case management to help veterans achieve self-sufficiency.

resources.name: Nashville Veterans Compact
resources.description: Non-profit organization providing comprehensive services to veterans including affordable housing, employment support, and community integration programs.

resources.name: Chattanooga Veterans Alliance
resources.description: Community organization serving veterans with food assistance, emergency financial aid, and referrals to health and social services.

resources.name: Veterans Legal Services of Tennessee
resources.description: Provides free legal assistance to veterans including help with VA claims, discharge upgrade applications, and benefits disputes.

resources.name: Tennessee Veterans Suicide Prevention Initiative
resources.description: Crisis support and mental health services for veterans in crisis, available 24/7 with trained counselors.

resources.name: Knoxville Veterans Community Center
resources.description: Comprehensive community center providing employment training, educational programs, food pantry, and health services for veterans.

resources.name: Tennessee VOSB Program
resources.address: 312 Rosa L. Parks Avenue, Nashville, TN 37210
resources.description: Veteran-Owned Small Business program providing business development support, contracts, and procurement opportunities for veteran entrepreneurs.

resources.name: Veterans Affairs Regional Office - Nashville
resources.description: Federal VA office processing benefits claims, providing disability compensation, pension benefits, and education assistance.
